summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 37th Avenue Southwest, from West Snoqualmie Street to West Dakota Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 93847 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
